    mergeron.gen.market_sample¶

    Methods to generate data for analyzing merger enforcement policy.

    Module Contents¶

    class mergeron.gen.market_sample.MarketSample[source]¶

    Bases: mergeron.gen.MarketSpec

    Parameter specification for market data generation.

    generate_sample(/, *, sample_size, seed_seq_list, nthreads, save_data_to_file)[source]¶

    Generate market data

    Parameters:¶
    sample_size : int¶

    Size of the market sample drawn

    seed_seq_list : list[numpy.random.SeedSequence] | None¶

    List of numpy.random.SeedSequence objects

    nthreads : int¶

    Number of threads to use

    save_data_to_file : mergeron.gen.upp_tests.SaveData¶

    Save data to given HDF5 file, at specified group node

    Return type:¶

    None

    Notes

    See documentation for mergeron.gen.data_generation.gen_market_sample for more information, and mergeron.gen.data_generation.parse_seed_seq_list() on the specification of seed_seq_list.

    estimate_enf_counts(_enf_parm_vec, _upp_test_regime, /, *, sample_size=10**6, seed_seq_list, nthreads, save_data_to_file=False)[source]¶

    Generate market data

    Parameters:¶
    _enf_parm_vec : mergeron.core.guidelines_boundaries.HMGThresholds¶

    Threshold values for various Guidelines criteria

    _upp_test_regime : mergeron.gen.UPPTestRegime¶

    Specifies whether to analyze enforcement, clearance, or both and the GUPPI and diversion ratio aggregators employed, with default being to analyze enforcement based on the maximum merging-firm GUPPI and maximum diversion ratio between the merging firms

    sample_size : int¶

    Size of the market sample drawn

    seed_seq_list : list[numpy.random.SeedSequence] | None¶

    List of numpy.random.SeedSequence objects

    nthreads : int¶

    Number of threads to use

    save_data_to_file : mergeron.gen.upp_tests.SaveData¶

    Save data to given HDF5 file, at specified group node

    Return type:¶

    None

    Notes

    See documentation for mergeron.gen.MarketSpec for details on specifying how shares, margins, prices, and diversion ratios are generated, and whether to restrict the sample to draws representing mergers that meet the HSR filing requirements. See mergeron.gen.MarketDataSample on the sample data generated; see, mergeron.gen.data_generation.parse_seed_seq_list() on the specification of seed_seq_list.
